author: Gracy Olmstead
title: With Grocery Shortages, Resilient Places Support Local Agriculture
description: Our highly consolidated, monoculture-based food system is fragile—and thus dangerous in times of calamity. The post With Grocery Shortages, Resilient Places Support Local Agriculture appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Our highly consolidated, monoculture-based food system is fragileand thus dangerous in times of calamity.Grocery stores across the United States emptied out this past week, after news regarding the rampant spread of Covid-19 frightened consumers and urged the… [+5463 chars]
